required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Establishment and Preliminary Evaluation of Digital Three Level Linkage Whole Process Diabetes Management System
clinical_study.official_title: Establishment and Preliminary Evaluation of Digital Three Level Linkage Whole Process Diabetes Management System

lead_sponsor.agency: Chongqing Renji Hospital, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences

clinical_study.source: Chongqing Renji Hospital, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences

brief_summary.textblock: This study used Nan'an District of Chongqing, China as a pilot project to improve the comprehensive compliance rate of diabetic patients in China, and reduce the physical and economic harm caused by complications.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Mobile app was used for follow-up

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline Glycated hemoglobin at 12 months
primary_outcome.description: Changes of glycated hemoglobin （percentage）before and after management

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline Blood pressure at 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: Changes of blood pressure（mmHg） before and after management

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline blood lipid at 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: Changes of blood lipid （mmol/L）before and after management

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline Diabetic nephropathy at 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: Changes of Diabetic nephropathy（ratio） before and after management

arm_group.description: Participants with diabetes who had access to a mobile APP
Diabetes participants who accepted the traditional management model

intervention.description: Traditional model management of Diabetes Mellitus patients
Management of diabetic patients with mobile phone APP
